sentences.en: But the two - toed tree toad tried in vain . He couldn't please her whim.
sentences.cn: 可是,二趾蟾蜍徒劳无功不能满足三趾蟾蜍女郎的心意.

sentences.en: But the two - toed tree toad tried in vain.
sentences.cn: 可是,二趾蟾蜍徒劳无功.

sentences.en: From her tree toad bower with her three - toed power the she - toad vetoed him.
sentences.cn: 在三趾蟾蜍女郎的卧室,三趾蟾蜍女郎用它的三趾能力将二趾蟾蜍的念头打消了.

sentences.en: He tip-toed to the door in his stockinged feet.
sentences.cn: 他踮着脚尖走到门口，只穿着袜子没穿鞋。

sentences.en: He toed into the table legs.
sentences.cn: 他把钉子斜着钉进了桌腿.

sentences.en: He was balanced, twinkle - toed and beautiful to watch.
sentences.cn: 他稳重, 虽然是八字脚却极具视觉美感.

sentences.en: He were a two - toed tree toad but a Number 3 - toed toad were IT.
sentences.cn: 它是一只二趾的蟾蜍,而蟾蜍女郎是三趾的.

sentences.en: Open - Toed or Backless Shoes: And mules a definite no - no.
sentences.cn: 露趾的或者无后跟的鞋子: 拖鞋是绝对不能穿的.

sentences.en: She toed cautiously into the room.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地踮着脚走进房间.

sentences.en: She toed scrupulously into the room.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地踮着脚走进房间。

sentences.en: The golfer accidentally toed the ball with his driver.
sentences.cn: 高尔夫球手一不小心用一号木杆打到了球.

sentences.en: The golfer toed the ball with his club.
The photo shows the model in a pigeon - toed pose and covering her modesty with her hands.
sentences.cn: 照片中的布吕尼双腿呈内八字姿势,双手遮住了羞处.

sentences.en: These birds are best known for their loud cackles, four - toed feet, and brilliant plumage.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟类是最有名的大声的咯咯声, 四趾脚, 和灿烂的鸟类羽毛.

sentences.en: They then found the same virus lurking in the genome of the three-toed sloth .
sentences.cn: 然后他们发现同样的病毒也潜伏在三趾树懒基因组里。

sentences.en: Women should go for close-toed heels, and if they wear a dress suit, the skirt should fall at or below the knee.
sentences.cn: 女士则应穿不露脚趾的高跟鞋，如穿着裙装套装，那么裙子要及膝或到膝盖以下。

phrases.tran_cn: 踵趾动作；踵和趾；脚跟与脚尖双脚旋转

trans.tran_en: having a part resembling a toe
